classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as depsides and depsidones. These are polycyclic compounds that is either a polyphenolic compound composed of two or more monocyclic aromatic units linked by an ester bond (depside), or a compound containing the depsidone structure (depsidone).

drug-interaction.name: Alpha-1-proteinase inhibitor
drug-interaction.description: Alpha-1-proteinase inhibitor may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat.

drug-interaction.name: Menadione
drug-interaction.description: Menadione may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat.

drug-interaction.description: Tranexamic acid may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat.

drug-interaction.description: Aminomethylbenzoic acid may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat.

drug-interaction.name: Fibrinogen human
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Fibrinogen human can be increased when used in combination with Camostat.

drug-interaction.name: Tretinoin
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Tretinoin is combined with Camostat.
